comment: To battle depression , there's a list of things people recommend . . Eat healthy . Exercise . Therapy . Pills . Get a good nights sleep . Think more positively and the list goes on . Some of these things are easier said than done ( part )
amr:

comment: Others are pretty much impossible when you're struggling to make ends meet , when your mom works jobs and she's struggling to make ends meet . How can I eat healthy when I can't afford to eat ? How can I go to therapy when I can barely afford my meds ?
amr:

comment: And a good night's sleep on this mattress . The system around beating depression only works if you have the money for it and if you don't well good luck , but no one wants to talk about that .
amr:
